text: "Jump" is a 1983 song by Van Halen and is the leading single from their sixth studio album 1984. It went to number 1 in the United States and Canada, number 7 in the United Kingdom and France, number 4 in Switzerland, Germany and Austria, number 12 in New Zealand, number 2 in Ireland and Australia and number 8 in Argentina. It was nominated for a Grammy Award in 1985. == References == Category:1983 songs Category:Hard rock songs Category:Pop rock songs Category:Synth rock songs Category:Van Halen songs
title: Jump (Van Halen song)
